id: Whitaker disqualifications run deeper than sketchy work history
paragraph: Rachel Maddow shares the latest reporting on Donald Trump's acting-attorney general pick, Matt Whitaker, that make his qualifications seem that much more dubious, including Senator Mark Warner's concerns about a conflict with the Mueller investigation because of Whitaker's closeness with Sam Clovis.Nov. 17, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
